definitions: Prepares or flavors food with curry powder or a curry sauce.
Dresses or grooms (a horse) with a currycomb.
Seeks to gain favor by flattery or obsequious behavior (often with 'favor' or 'up to').
examples: She curries the chicken with a blend of spices.
The stable hand curries the horse every morning.
He curries favor with his boss to get a promotion.
